name: Myo-Reps (12–20 rep activation) ~8 min
time_per_session_breakdown: 1 activation set (~45s) + several 20s rests + 3-5 rep mini-sets => ~8 min total
overview_and_execution: Perform an activation set of 12–20 reps near failure, rest ~20s, then do mini-sets of 3–5 reps with 20s rest until you can’t reach 3 reps. Increase weight once total volume hits 20–25 reps.
example_application: Leg Press: 200 lbs for 15 reps, rest 20s, do 4 reps, rest 20s, do 3 reps, etc. Stop when you can’t reach 3 reps. Add 5 lbs next time if you easily surpass 20 total reps.
important_notes: Focus on continuous tension and minimal rest to maximize recruitment.
